title: WaterWatch – River & Groundwater Monitor
goal: Visualize changes in river levels and water quality across regions.
why_it_matters: Groundwater depletion and contamination data are underused for prevention.
data: Central Water Commission API, rainfall data, pH & TDS datasets.
ai: Regression for correlation between rainfall and water table depth.
Clustering for quality classification (clean / moderate / polluted).
workflow: Aggregate and clean water level records.
Correlate rainfall trends and detect anomalies.
outcome: Strong data engineering + spatial analytics demonstration.
